医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，怀孕期间的维生素 D 可以多年促进儿童骨骼健康研究人员研究了从 MAVIDOS 试验到童年后期骨矿物质密度改善的持续性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Vitamin-D-during-pregnancy-boosts-childhood-bone-health-for-years-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Vitamin-D-during-pregnancy-boosts-childhood-bone-health-for-years-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb4fda4a-2f97-42e7-9908-9d8feff11a50 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 22:24:00 -0400 Vitamin D during pregnancy boosts childhood bone health for years, study shows
首次癌症诊断时体重过重会增加患第二次癌症的风险最近的一项研究表明，首次诊断出癌症时体重超重的成年人患第二原发癌症的风险较高，尤其是与肥胖相关的癌症。该研究强调需要针对体重管理的生存指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Excess-body-weight-at-first-cancer-diagnosis-increases-risk-of-second-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Excess-body-weight-at-first-cancer-diagnosis-increases-risk-of-second-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e7cd212-9a03-4915-84ea-4358d0b9699b Sun, 22 Sep 2024 22:09:00 -0400 Excess body weight at first cancer diagnosis increases risk of second cancer
怀孕期间的地中海饮食可降低儿童肥胖风险怀孕期间采用地中海饮食可以降低儿童在两岁时超重或肥胖的可能性，并且该饮食组中没有出现肥胖病例。饮食对瘦素基因的影响可以解释这些效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Mediterranean-diet-during-pregnancy-reduces-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Mediterranean-diet-during-pregnancy-reduces-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40e10788-63ac-4d9a-b763-32bf2442f38d Sun, 22 Sep 2024 21:07:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet during pregnancy reduces childhood obesity risk
膳食抗原通过增强免疫 T 细胞来减少小肠癌研究表明，饮食抗原可以通过派尔氏集结激活 T 细胞来抑制小肠癌的发生。在无抗原饮食中添加牛血清白蛋白（BSA）或卵清蛋白（OVA）可以恢复小鼠的免疫功能并减少肿瘤生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Dietary-antigens-reduce-small-intestine-cancer-by-boosting-immune-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Dietary-antigens-reduce-small-intestine-cancer-by-boosting-immune-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9b949f7-8781-4a49-af9f-a737cfc16ac2 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 20:57:00 -0400 Dietary antigens reduce small intestine cancer by boosting immune T-cells
童年早期生活在食物荒漠中会增加长期肥胖风险生活在幼儿期食物获取有限的低收入地区的儿童在 15 岁时面临更高的 BMI 和肥胖风险。当怀孕和幼儿期经历粮食不安全时，影响最为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Living-in-food-deserts-during-early-childhood-raises-long-term-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Living-in-food-deserts-during-early-childhood-raises-long-term-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e00ddf6a-c897-42b6-a89c-cd229058030e Sun, 22 Sep 2024 20:41:00 -0400 Living in food deserts during early childhood raises long-term obesity risk
研究表明，人工智能驱动的城市规划模型误导了公共卫生干预措施使用谷歌街景（GSV）进行城市规划的人工智能模型可能会导致有关公共卫生的错误结论，特别是在肥胖和糖尿病方面。研究表明，对健康结果影响更大的是身体活动水平，而不是人行道等环境特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/AI-driven-urban-planning-models-mislead-public-health-interventions-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/AI-driven-urban-planning-models-mislead-public-health-interventions-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d13ce82f-d97c-454a-b904-851e7a9080a2 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 20:28:00 -0400 AI-driven urban planning models mislead public health interventions, study shows
研究人员发现了美国各地 COVID-19 病例的新振荡模式研究人员发现了美国各地 COVID-19 病例先前未被认识的振荡趋势，特别是围绕北纬 37°-38° 的南北振荡。这些模式凸显了流行病动态的复杂性以及了解区域疾病传播的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Researchers-identify-new-oscillatory-patterns-in-COVID-19-cases-across-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Researchers-identify-new-oscillatory-patterns-in-COVID-19-cases-across-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64ab03cd-b5d5-43a2-9666-c9e3889b4593 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 20:15:00 -0400 Researchers identify new oscillatory patterns in COVID-19 cases across the U.S.
蔓越莓汁：女性皮肤健康的天然促进剂研究发现，富含多酚的蔓越莓饮料可以改善皮肤弹性、减少紫外线引起的红斑并调节皮肤微生物群，对 40 岁及以上的女性效果最为明显。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Cranberry-juice-A-natural-boost-for-womens-skin-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Cranberry-juice-A-natural-boost-for-womens-skin-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6503d88e-c112-4ba1-9727-a18503a13e62 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 19:49:00 -0400 Cranberry juice: A natural boost for women's skin health
与标准血液测试相比，金纳米颗粒 X 射线可改善肾脏疾病的检测在 7 月 29 日发表在《先进材料》杂志上的一项研究中，德克萨斯大学达拉斯分校的研究人员发现，使用金纳米颗粒作为造影剂对肾脏进行 X 射线检查可能比标准实验室血液检查更准确地检测肾脏疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/X-rays-with-gold-nanoarticles-improve-kidney-disease-detection-over-standard-blood-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/X-rays-with-gold-nanoarticles-improve-kidney-disease-detection-over-standard-blood-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5779cbf-3864-497d-86ec-8507254c063c Fri, 20 Sep 2024 18:35:00 -0400 X-rays with gold nanoparticles improve kidney disease detection over standard blood tests
科学家开发出重新定位错位蛋白质的新方法细胞是高度受控的空间，依赖于每种蛋白质都位于正确的位置。许多疾病，包括癌症和神经退行性疾病，都与错位的蛋白质有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Scientists-develop-new-method-for-relocating-misplaced- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Scientists-develop-new-method-for-relocating-misplaced- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2815fe20-5a6c-402b-9dc1-ab337b38d845 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 17:51:00 -0400 Scientists develop new method for relocating misplaced proteins
